title: RT TV On Going Broke Throwing Parties, Love For Hentai, Rise To Fame & More
description:
RT TV chop it up with Flakko about their come-up, making the big move from Rhode Island to LA, working with Issa Rae, DSmoke, backlash from Eminem Stans, and much more!¬†
https://www.instagram.com/poetikflakko/
https://www.youtube.com/c/RTTV2011/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/_rttv_/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/robcityrt/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/patricrt/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wellz_rt/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/dcz_worldrt/

-----
00:00 Intro
3:18 Started forming as a group before college, inspired by Charlamagne
6:00 Got in the concert business, booked Bobby Shmurda super early, and did the interview
6:44 Beef with YG and DJ Mustard
8:38 Started Youtube in 2011/2012, booked/interviewed Durk, Herbo etc
9:43 Breakfast Club and Vladtv are their main inspirations + Booking artists in college, losing money
10:58 Watching Taxstone on Vladtv changed everything: ‚ÄúYou have to do it to make shit happen!‚Äù
13:56 Reacting to 21 Savage, getting 20k views overnight, never stopped since then
15:04 Fifth Harmony reaction got crazy backlash
21:05 Flakko wanna know why they love anime
23:50¬†üçÜ to hentai
29:54 Nicki Minaj reposted their reaction and it went crazy: ‚ÄúThank u NickiMinaj!"
34:34 Eminem's "Killshot" is the reaction that got them the biggest jump in views and subs
35:14 Getting backlash after the Revival reaction, say Eminem dissed them in "Chloraseptic" Remix
36:20 RTTV ask Flakko about his altercation with 16ShotEm¬†
41:33 RTTV say Flakko did provoke 16ShotEm
47:55 Moving to LA, realized they were popular when some girl almost fainted in front of them
51:39 Hassled after being recognized at a karaoke bar
52:41 Working with Patreon, Issa Rae, Dsmoke
53:53 Getting ooooowned by Gio Wise
58:55 Smooth Gio or King Cid?

-----
